docs.lead_paragraph: The F.D.A. is set to approve the first malaria drug to contain a wormwood derivative - a popular treatment for the disease in Africa and Asia.

headline.seo: F.D.A. Approval May Come Soon for Malaria Drug
headline.main: Malaria Drug May Soon Be Set for U.S. Debut
headline.print_headline: Malaria Drug May Soon Be Set for U.S. Debut

docs.snippet: The F.D.A. is set to approve the first malaria drug to contain a wormwood derivative - a popular treatment for the disease in Africa and Asia.
